name: nl.cwi.dis.cwipc
description: The Cwipc Unity package allows capturing point clouds, loading them from disk, displaying them, and serializing and compressing them for transmission. At runtime it requires <https://github.com/cwi-dis/cwipc> to be installed.

samples.description: Show a stream of point clouds from a depth camera or other source, or do a 2-computer session with both users represented as point clouds
A two user interactive VR session, using optional HMD and controllers. Needs simple samples.
